New Records: England became the first dual white-ball champions, holding both the 50- and 20-over titles
Key Match Events: Ben Stokes's unbeaten 52 steered England to a five-wicket victory with six balls remaining
England slumped to 49-3 in the sixth over
Stokes and Moeen Ali used their experience and cool heads to guide England to 138-5 with six balls to spare
Post-Match Reflections: The victory added to the 50-over title England won in 2019, building on the legacy of former captain Eoin Morgan
It was England's second T20 crown after tasting success in 2010, joining the West Indies as the only two-time winners since the tournament's inception in 2007
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played in front of a partisan 80,462 fans at the Melbourne Cricket Ground
The tournament spanned 45 games over nearly a month
